Package uicontrollers.user

Class UserMenuController

java.lang.Object
uicontrollers.user.UserMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class UserMenuController extends Object implements Controller
This class serves as a controller for user's dashboard. From this window, the user can access to all user level feature such as manipulation of bets, user profile and money movements.
